column4: okay so I'm trying to install ubuntu from the alternate cd (need lvm) and I get the error saying please insert disk .... I tried taking the disk out and putting it back in but nothing happens. Can I just edit /etc/apt/sources.list to install from online?
Do the netboot images support lvm??
Are the netboot images basically the alternate installer?
not used it myself (so you don't feel ignored :))
